rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. Each number outside the grid is the sum of digits between 1 and 6 in the corresponding row or column.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. Each number outside the grid is the sum of digits between 1 and 9 in the corresponding row or column.
